title: QuizFlight - Interactive Learning Platform
content:
We, as QuizFlight, respect your privacy and would like to inform you about which information about you we collect and how we process that information.

We are committed to protect and respect your privacy.

This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit, register, subscribe, or make a purchase from the Website. We only use your personal data when the law allows us to do.

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. All changes will be made public on our Website. Your continued use of the Website after any changes have been made has the meaning of your acceptance of our new Privacy Policy. Words beginning with capital letters which are not defined in this Privacy Policy are defined in the Terms and Conditions.

1. DEFINITIONS

  • Children refers to the child who is below the age of 16 years and their personal data processing shall be lawful only if and to the extent that consent is given by the holder of parental responsibility over the child according to GDPR, and the child who is below the age of 13 according to COPPA, the child who is below the age 18 according to soma countries laws.
  • COPPA refers to a federal law that imposes specific requirements on operators of websites and online services to protect the privacy of children under 13,
  • EU refers to European Union
  • EEA refers to European Economic Area which includes more of the European Union Member States plus Iceland, Lichtenstein and Norway
  • GDPR refers to General Data Protection Regulation which governs the legal framework of the collection and processing of personal information
  • Personal Information refers to any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person
  • We refers to Quizfligth INC., "QuizFlight"
  • Website refers to https://www.quizflight.com/ or any portion of it
  • You refers to User, the authorized user of the Website
  • U.K. refers to United Kingdom

2. PERSONAL INFORMATION WE MAY COLLECT AND PROCESS ABOUT YOU:

If You are a visitor of our Website and/or if You would like to use certain features of our Website and/or play QuizFlight games we shall collect your Personal Information either directly or indirectly. In case you decide to register and make a subsription of our Website, You will be required to register and create an account with QuizFlight in order to access and use our Services available on the Website. Therefore, you will be required to provide certain Personal Information, including the following:

Personal Information You provide

  • Your first and last name, username, your e-mail address, and password.
  • Your connection devices via google analytics therefore we do process these informations
  • You shall provide information by filling out forms on our Website, which may be amended from time to time by us.
  • Any transactions You carry out through our Website, your orders; details of your visits to our Website, including, but not limited to traffic data, location data, weblogs, and other communication data, whether this is required for our own billing purposes or otherwise; and the resources that you access.

Personal Information collected automatically

  • We automatically collect certain information when You visit, use or navigate our Website. This information does not reveal your specific identity like your name and contact information but may include device and usage information such as browser and device characteristics, operating system and what parts of our products and services you interact with or spend time using.
  • When you use our Services, We automatically collect information on the type of device You use and the version of your operating system. We do not ask you for, access, or track any location-based information from your mobile device at any time while downloading or using our application or products and services.
  • Device information that We collect helps us also screen for potential risk and fraud and, more generally, to improve and optimize our Website.

Personal Information collected from other sources

From time to time, We may collect Personal Information about You from other sources, such as our partners or other third parties, for example where you have given permission to the third party to share your information with us. We may also collect Personal Information from integrated third-party technologies. For example, if you access third-party services, such as Microsoft, Apple, Google, Wonde or Clever to login to the Webite or to share information about your experience with others, we may collect information from these third-party services. If you choose to connect a Google integration to your QuizFlight account, we ask you to grant permission to view or download, your Google applications which will allows to configure your Google integration in accordance with your preferences.

3. HOW DO WE USE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION AND WITH WHOM WE DO SHARE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION?

We only use your Personal Information when we have a legitimate reason for doing so. We only collect Personal Information that is reasonably necessary to provide our Services to You for the following purposes:

  • To provide You QuizFlight Services that We have engaged to perform which are Interactive quizzes, adaptive content, and real-time tracking for personalized learning, therefore we carry our obligations to You.
  • To make you recommendations about our Services and to follow up your enquiries, We also use contact information from registered users to manage their accounts, to provide customer support, and notice them about their subscriptions.
  • -To respond to user inquiries and/or offer support to Users, We therefore shall solve any potential issues You might have with requested Services.
  • We use contact information to communicate and interact with You directly to send notifications regarding upcoming feature updates or promotions.

In general; We use the information We collect to fulfill any orders placed through the Website, to communicate with You, to send you information about us, in the event you give explicit consent, to send you updates and announcements about our products and services, promotions, and programs, and to send you invitations to join our special programs; to customize our products and services' content based on your past events within our Website, in case you give explicit consent; to provide personalized location-based services and content using the physical location of your device.

In case You give explicit consent; to send newsletters, campaign information or promotions about our new Services, answer your questions or comments, meet your requests as well as provide advertisements or marketing communications we believe may be of interest to You.

We never store credit card and bank card information or other payment instrument data. We use Stripe which is level 1 PCI compliant third-party vendors, to process online payments and invoicing.

We will share transaction data with our payment service providers only to the extent necessary for the purposes of processing your payments.

When QuizFlight contacts You via e-mail, message, or other direct marketing activities, You are always given the option to opt out of direct marketing and change your marketing preferences at any time. Besides; You can make any choice as to whether or not to receive such information while registering to Website or after being registered to Website via your profile. You can choose not to provide certain data to us, but you may not be able to use certain features of the Services. In case You have consented; we may send You the Commercial Electronic Messages (such as telephone, e-mail, SMS, social networks, mail) containing product and campaign updates and offers to You through our direct marketing methods.

We can also transfer your Personal Information to our data service provider. For more detailed information https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=tr Unless You opt out of certain communication features, We may use your information to communicate with You, such as through e-mail, newsletters, and telephone. You may opt out and/or unsubscribe to communications at any time. You may always contact us to via team@quizflight.com to review, update and correct your Personal Information. Our e-mails will include a link to opt out from receiving further electronic communications from us. At places on Website where You give us your Personal Information, You may opt out of receiving those communications. We may need to verify your identity before providing you with Personal Information or updating it in our system.

4. WHAT LEGAL BASES DO WE RELY ON TO PROCESS YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION

If You are located in the EU or UK, this section applies to You GDPR require us to explain the valid legal bases We rely on in order to process your Personal Information.

We may process your Personal Information if You have given us consent to use your Personal Information for a specific purpose. You can withdraw your consent anytime as We mentioned above.

If You are a resident of California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Indiana, Iowa, Kentucky, Minnesota, Montana, Nebraska, New Hampshire, New Jersey, Oregon, Tennessee, Texas, Utah or Virginia, You may have the right to request access to and receive details about the Personal Information We maintain about You and how We have processed it, correct inaccuracies, get a copy of, or delete your Personal Information. You may also have the right to withdraw your consent to our processing of your Personal Information. These rights may be limited in some circumstances by applicable law.

If You are located in Canada, this section applies to You;
We may process your information if You gave given us specific permission to use your Personal Information for a specific purpose or in situations where You give implied consent. In some exceptional circumstances, We may be legally permitted under applicable law to process your information without your consent.

5. HOW LONG WE KEEP YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION

We will keep your Personal Information for as long as it is necessary to fulfill the purpose for which We obtained your Personal Information and any other permitted purposes permitted by law, and in compliance with our data retention policies. When We no longer need your Personal Information, We will remove it from our systems and/or take steps to anonymize it.

6. GOOGLE ANALYTICS

We use Google Analytics, a web analysis service of Google Inc. ("Google"). Google Analytics uses "cookies" to analyse the use You make of the Website. These services help us analyse your use of the Services, including information like the third-party website You arrive from, how often you visit, events within the Services, usage and performance data, and where the application was downloaded from.

7. DATA RETENTION

You agree and undertake that your Personal Information that You shared with us is accurate and is up-to-date, and You also accept that information is important in terms of your rights on personal data according to relevant law and legislation. We do not have any liability whatsoever in terms of the false and inaccurate Personal Information that You shared with us.

8. YOUR RIGHTS

According to the related law and regulations:

  • According to the related law and regulations of the state of residence in US or in some regions such as EEA, UK, Switzerland and Canada, You have rights that allow You greater access to and control over your Personal Information.
  • You have a right to be informed whether your Personal Information has been processed, request information about how the data has been collected and processed;
  • You have a right to access any of your Personal Information which has been collected and request the purpose of processing Personal Information and whether the process is fit for the purpose;
  • You have a right to know the third parties in which your Personal Information has been transferred domestically or abroad,
  • You have a right to request adjustment if Personal Information is incomplete or incorrectly processed,
  • You have right to request from us to delete, destroy or anonymize Personal Information; in case the personal data is incomplete or incorrectly processed,
  • You have right to restrict processing to only certain types,
  • You have a right request to notify third parties about the data relating correction or deletion,
  • You have the right to object to decisions based solely on computer processing and to question the decisions made about you by a computer,
  • You have a right to request a compensation about the damage if the personal data has been processed unlawfully.

9. SECURITY

We take reasonable security measures designed to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your Personal information. These measures include Cyber Incident Management, Physical and Environmental Security, Account Management and Access Control, Systems Security, Vulnerability Management, Operations Security which compromise encryption, intrusion detection, intrusion prevention, anti-malware endpoint protection and industry standard data center security measures to guard against unauthorized access to systems where we process your Personal Information.

However, despite our safeguards and efforts to secure your information and take all these reasonable measures, We cannot guarantee that security measures are without any fault whatsoever and We cannot promise or warrant that your information will always remain secure as no electronic transmission over the internet or information technology can be guaranteed to be %100 secure. Allthough We will do our best to protect your Personal Information, transmission of Personal Information to and from our Services is at your own risk. You should access the Services within a secure environment.. In case You believe that any breach of security has been occurred, You must notify us immediately via team@quizflight.com . In case We reasonably believe that any of your Personal Information has been used which is not permitted by this Privacy Policy, We shall suspend access rights by giving notice to You, We shall also require from you to change your password.

10. INTERNATIONAL TRANSFERS

We shall collect, process and store your Personal Information outside of your residency. When We transfer your Personal Information, We take all preventive and reasonable measures to protect your Personal Information. All international transfers to a third countries are made based on an appropriate legal basis. For further information please contact us.

11. DELETING, DESTROYING OR ANONYMIZE YOUR PERSONAL DATA

Your personal data which is processed according to the Privacy Policy; shall be destroyed, anonymized or deleted in case the purpose for processing, in accordance with the relevant law and legislation, has been terminated and/or in case the legal periods that we should keep the data has been terminated.

12. EXTERNAL LINKS AND THIRD PARTIES

We cannot guarantee or verify the contents of any externally linked websites. You should note that if You click on any external links at your own risk, You agree and understand that We cannot be held liable for any damages or implications whatsoever caused by visiting any external links. This Privacy Policy does not cover any third party's use or handling of your information once it is shared. The privacy policies of the third-party will govern that situation. This is your responsibility to fully read and understand third party privacy policies.

13. POLICY CONCERNING CHILDREN

If you are under 13 years of age or under 16 years of age according to GDPR, or under 18 years of age according to certain applicable laws, you cannot send your Personal Information without the consent of your parent or your legal guardian. In the event We have learn that We collected Personal Information from a child under 13, We will take reasonable steps to delete such information.

14. QUESTIONS AND CONTACT

In case You have any questions, concerns, or disputes regarding our Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us with a written notification, to our address mentioned in the Website, according to the related law and regulation.

Contact us at team@quizflight.com or by writing to us at:

QuizFlight INC.
112 Capitol Trail Suite A, Newark, Delaware

On any email or postal letter you send, please include "Privacy" in the subject line.

Last updated: 07.01.2025
